actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for an easement for the transportation of surface water through the Big Thicket National Preserve in the State of Texas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to grant an easement through the Big Thicket National Preserve, Texas, for transferring raw surface water from the lower Sabine River to Lake Houston.

titles.title: To provide for an easement for the transportation of surface water through the Big Thicket National Preserve in the State of Texas.
